title: Prestige edition skins
body: Currently there are 12 prestige edition skins with only 2 out of the twelve being male and i am just wondering why the fuck riot wont add more male prestige edition skins seriously riot stop milking the horny 12 year olds with these skins like prestige edition arcade caitlyn and k/da prestige skins and give people like skarner some love.

replies.body: Well if it is any silver lining for you, the next 4 prestige skins will be half male, Lee Sin and Thresh. Other 2 are Miss Fortune and Qiyana
